EmailTemplate.subject: Compassion Fund Approval Request for {!Compassion_Fund__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Approval_Requesting_User.Name} has requested your approval for the following item.
To approve or reject this item, click this link {!ApprovalRequest.External_URL} and select the appropriate action.
If you approve this request, please include the recommended Grant Amount in the Comments of your reply.
Thank you, The WEX Cares Foundation
